text: aur jo log khuda se ehad va paimaan ko pakka karane ke baad tod daalate hain aur jin (taalukaat baahamee) ke qaayam rakhane ka khuda ne hukm diya hai unhen qata (todate) karate hain aur rue zameen par fasaad phailaate phirate hain aise hee log hain jinake lie laanat hai aur aise hee logon ke vaaste bada ghar (jahannum) hai
